Slovenian BANK HOLIDAY: August 15, 2022 – EUR payments paused
Bitstamp EUR payments paused on Monday, August 15, 2022, due to a public holiday in Slovenia.

Due to Assumption Day on August 15, 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing EUR payments will be paused.

EUR deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Tuesday, August 16, 2022.

USD and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.
